p: This main group consisted of 4 subgroups. Mice used pure water (without PO), water mixed with 50 mg/kg of PO, water mixed with 100 mg/kg of PO, and water mixed with 200 mg/kg of PO in groups 1 (control group), 2, 3 and 4, respectively. Then, blood and urine samples were collected every 12 hours (0-, 12-, 24-, and 36-hr) according to the study of Bekkevold et al. (2012) â–¶.
